comprehensive_overview: souporcell is a tool for unsupervised clustering of single-cell RNA-seq data, helping identify and genotype mosaic cell populations.
core_features: 1. Unsupervised clustering of single-cell RNA-seq data. 2. Detection and genotyping of mosaic cell populations. 3. Identification of cell type-specific genetic variants. 4. Utilizes genotype likelihoods for accurate cell identification and clustering.
